sentences.sContent: You practice it while eating lunch.
sentences.sCn: 你一边吃午餐一边练习；

sentences.sContent: I went into the dining room of the Governors Mansion, where my friends were eating lunch, told them I wasn’t running, and apologized for bringing them all down.
sentences.sContent_eng: I went into the dining room of the Governors Mansion, where my friends were eating lunch, told them I wasn’t running, and apologized for bringing them all down.
sentences.sCn: 我走进州长官邸的饭厅，朋友们正在吃午餐，我告诉他们说不打算竞选总统了，对邀请他们大老远地跑过来感到抱歉。

sentences.sContent: 'I've cleared customs sitting in the dining car eating lunch, ' Mr. Thompson says.
sentences.sContent_eng: 'I've cleared customs sitting in the dining car eating lunch, ' Mr. Thompson says.
sentences.sCn: 汤普森说：我是坐在餐车吃午饭的时候办理通关手续的。
